body.para: This is an improvement. Reducing priority for Tinkiri release.

quote.quotepara: DLCM: redirect the user into promoted or demoted lifecyle collection.

Key: CARBON-3959 URL: https://wso2.org/jira/browse/CARBON-3959 Project: WSO2 Carbon Issue Type: Improvement Components: Registry Affects Versions: 2.0 M2 Reporter: Krishantha Samaraweera Assignee: Ruwan Janapriya

Add DLC and promote it to next level. Once you promote or demote the lifecycle
state, it is better if we can redirect the users to next lifecycle phase
collection. And also it is good to display a message box saying whether the lifecycle
promote/demote successfully or not.
